faq.happyToHelp: and we'll be happy to help!

items.question: How long does it take to build a website?
items.answer: Build time depends on the package chosen. Basic takes 2-3 weeks, Basic Plus 3-4 weeks, Extra 4-6 weeks, and Extra Plus 6-8 weeks.

items.question: Will the website be mobile-adapted?
items.answer: Yes! All our websites are built with full responsive design and adapted to all devices - computer, tablet and phone.

items.question: Do you provide support after launch?
items.answer: Yes, all packages include technical support. Basic and Basic Plus include basic support, Extra and Extra Plus include full support.

items.question: Will the website include SEO?
items.answer: Yes, all our websites are built with basic search engine optimization. In the more advanced packages we'll add advanced optimization.
